source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_00<tab>Nonotta is keen to put the past behind her, and move on to the final part of the prophecy.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ノノッタは、エッグハントの次なる催しを紹介したいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_01<tab>After securing your silence regarding the strange exchange you witnessed between her and the leader of the Shellshockers, Nonotta bids you head to Limsa Lominsa to defend the auspicious spriggan from the ruffians' assuredly evil plans. Motte, the Dreamer in charge of the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities in La Noscea, awaits you by the Aftcastle.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ノノッタから、「幸運のスプリガン」を悪党から守るため、リムサ・ロミンサに向かってほしいという依頼を受けた。「幸運のスプリガン」をめぐる騒動が彼女たちによる自作自演ではないか、という疑惑はそっと胸にしまい、リムサ・ロミンサのアフトカースルで「モット」に話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_02<tab>Motte is pleased to reveal that the auspicious spriggan has indeed been sighted in Limsa Lominsa. At least, she thinks he has: three similar spriggans, each carrying an unusual egg, have been seen scurrying around the upper decks. She bids you speak with her sylphic helper, who has a cunning plan to expose the suspicious spriggans' true nature.
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_02<tab>モットから、「幸運のスプリガン」のニセモノの正体を暴いてほしいという依頼を受けた。近くにいる「おまぢない師」に話しかけて、見破りの方策を聞こう。

source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_03<tab>The sylphic sorceress has laid in store an arsenal of sylphic scalebombs that can break through the strongest of illusory magicks. Transforming you into spriggan form so that you might blend into the crowd, she entrusts you with three bombs─one for each of the suspicious spriggans. Seek out a spriggan holding an unusual egg, and toss a truesight scalebomb at the creature before it can get away.

※If the transfiguration should fade, speak with the sylphic sorceress again to be changed back into spriggan form.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_03<tab>おまぢない師と話し、スプリガンの姿に変えてもらった。冒険者と違うタマゴを持ったスプリガンが、リムサ・ロミンサの上甲板層に3匹いて、そのうち1匹だけが本物の「幸運のスプリガン」らしい。変身状態で、1匹目のスプリガンに声をかけて「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」を使おう。

※変身状態が解除された場合、再度「おまぢない師」に話しかけることで「変身状態」になれます。

source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_04<tab>You toss a truesight scalebomb at the first of the suspicious spriggans, stripping a Shellshocker of his disguise. The boastful brigand escapes, leaving you with two suspicious spriggans remaining. Hunt down another, and use a truesight scalebomb to expose its true nature.

※If the transfiguration should fade, speak with the sylphic sorceress again to be changed back into spriggan form.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_04<tab>怪しいスプリガンの正体を見破った。その正体は、スプリガンに姿を変えた、エッグクラッシャーのひとりだった。変身状態で、2匹目のスプリガンに声をかけて「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」を使おう。

※変身状態が解除された場合、再度「おまぢない師」に話しかけることで「変身状態」になれます。

source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_05<tab>The second suspicious spriggan was another Shellshocker in disguise, leaving just one of their number still at large. Could this be the real auspicious spriggan? Track down the creature, and throw a truesight scalebomb at him to make sure.

※If the transfiguration should fade, speak with the sylphic sorceress again to be changed back into spriggan form.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_05<tab>2匹目の怪しいスプリガンの正体を見破った。最後に残る1匹が、本物の「幸運のスプリガン」だろうか？変身状態で、3匹目のスプリガンに声をかけて「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」を使おう。

※変身状態が解除された場合、再度「おまぢない師」に話しかけることで「変身状態」になれます。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_06<tab>The truesight scalebomb has no effect on the creature, confirming that it is indeed the auspicious spriggan of Jihli Aliapoh's vision. The spriggan departs, leaving you with a fragmentary message of big eggs and lucky treasure. Could he have been speaking of the wondrous treasure revealed to Jihli by the Archons of yore? Return to Motte, to see if she can divine any meaning from the spriggan's words.
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_06<tab>幸運のスプリガンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>を使ったが、何も起きなかった。やはり最後の1匹が、本物だったようだ。幸運のスプリガンは、冒険者にカタコトのメッセージを残して去っていった。ここまでの成果を、アフトカースルの「モット」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_07<tab>The spriggan's words strike a chord with Motte. Jihli did not only dream of spriggans in the cities; she saw spriggans out in the wilds, too─dancing around giant, floating eggs, and trying to crack them open. Her Dreamers managed to track down the locations of these scenes, and found the very eggs Jihli dreamed of. Sylphic sorceresses have been dispatched to each location, to bring the scenes from Jihli's vision to life: to crack open the eggs, and win whatever prizes hide inside. Win a lucky egg by participating in the FATE “Gloria in Eggcelsis,” and give it to Motte. The FATE can be found at the following locations: southwest of Summerford Farms in middle La Noscea; east of the Salt Strand in lower La Noscea; south of Hyrstmill in the North Shroud; southeast of the Ul'dah Dispatch Yard in central Thanalan; and east of Camp Drybone in eastern Thanalan.

※To participate in the FATE, you must first be transfigured into spriggan form by the nearby sylphic sorceress.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_07<tab>モットに報告した。彼女の推測によれば、「幸運のスプリガン」は「大いなる宝物」のありかを教えてくれたのだという。中央ラノシアの「サマーフォード庄」南西、
低地ラノシアの「ソルトストランド」東、黒衣森：北部森林の「ハーストミル」南、中央ザナラーンの「ウルダハ操車庫」南東、東ザナラーンの「キャンプ・ドライボーン」東で発生しているF.A.T.E.『ジャイアントエッグハント』を達成し、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」を入手しよう。入手した<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>は、アフトカースルの「モット」に渡そう。

※F.A.T.E.に参加するためには、現地で「おまぢない師」に話しかけて「変身状態」になる必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_08<tab>Motte's hands tremble with anticipation as you hand over the lucky egg that she is sure contains the prophesied treasure. But as Jihli arrives to witness the crowning glory of her festival, so too does the auspicious spriggan, who is clearly not all he seems. Motte is forced into a confession: the events of the day were nothing but a drama staged by her and the other Dreamers. The auspicious spriggan, the Shellshockers, the treasure inside the lucky egg─all were false. At Jihli's angry insistence, Motte explains how the play was to end: she was to substitute the lucky egg's contents with a treasure map guiding Jihli to the Bismarck. By way of apology, Motte bids you come to the Bismarck too, to partake in the “wondrous treasure” that she and her accomplices have prepared. Speak to the one-eyed wretch in the restaurant to witness the unveiling.
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_08<tab>モットに<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>を渡した。ところが報告中、エッグハントで遭遇した事件すべてが、ジリ・アリアポーの夢を実現するために仕組まれた「お芝居」であったことが露見してしまった。首謀者はジリを除くエッグハント実行委員の面々と、都市民の協力者。彼らの真意を問うため、リムサ・ロミンサのレストラン「ビスマルク」にいる「ワルぶった眼帯男」に話を聞こう。

source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_09<tab>You and Jihli arrive at the Bismarck to find that her Dreamers have organized a surprise nameday party for her. Jihli is moved to see so many well-wishers joining together to share the warmth of their hearts, and recalls the words the Archons of yore spoke unto her in her dream─how she was to follow a bearer of fortune and tour the wonders of the land, to overcome a grave peril and find a wondrous treasure. She realizes that the prophecy has indeed come true: she has overcome the peril posed by her friends' deceit, and gained the wondrous treasure of a closer understanding with her friends, and a renewed determination to make Hatching<var 1F /var>tide a day of great joy. The “bearer of fortune” can only be you: the one who has toured the land in pursuit of the treasure, and led Jihli to such a happy conclusion.

Sated with the night's revelries, you prepare to depart the Bismarck, but just as you are about to leave, you are called to a halt by Baderon Tenfingers, proprietor of the Adventurers' Guild. To your surprise, he congratulates you for saving the realm from imminent destruction. Unbeknownst to you or the Dreamers, the enormous eggs from Jihli's vision were actually Allagan doomsday devices, relics of the ancient empire that would have reduced Eorzea to ruins had they been left unattended. Realizing with some discomfort that it was luck alone that led to the weapons' discovery and deactivation, Baderon bids you never to speak of this knowledge to anyone, lest they live their lives in fear of what other unholy menaces sleep unnoticed beneath the soil.
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SEQ_09<tab>冒険者がレストラン「ビスマルク」に到着するのと同時に、ジリ・アリアポーも店に現れた。そこでは意外にも、彼女の誕生日を祝うサプライズパーティーが用意されていた。仲間と街の人々の祝福に、感激で言葉をつまらせるジリ・アリアポー。彼女は、夢のお告げで聞いた「大いなる宝物」とは、冒険者がもたらした彼らとの絆のことだと考え、これからもエッグハントのお祭りを続けようと決意を新たにする。謝辞を受けつつ立ち去った冒険者の前に、冒険者ギルドの顔役バデロンが現れた。彼は、冒険者が撃退したのは、古代の恐るべき兵器だったことを告げ、何も知らずにエオルゼア全土の危機を救ったジリ・アリアポーと仲間たちの強運に、いたく感心するのだった。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_000<tab>That Shellshocker was a piece of work, wasn't he? Acting as if he knew me... Do you know what I think we should do? Forget all about it, and never speak of his impudence to anybody─ever! ...Do you promise that you won't tell Jihli? Cross your heart and hope to die?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_000<tab>エグ、エグ、エ～グ、エッグラホ♪
あの……ついさっき、悪者が親しげに話しかけてきたことは、
そっと胸にしまってね……ノノッタ、一生のお願い！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_100_000<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Well, now that little unpleasantness is out of the way, let us return to business! Hatching Hour is nearly upon us, and there is much and more to be done before the prophecy is realized.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_100_000<tab>それでは……気を取り直して！
冒険者さんに、新たなお願いをしたいのですぅ～。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>As the Archons of yore revealed it to Jihli, the “bearer of fortune” shall guide the realm to a “wondrous treasure.” Do you see? We must track down the auspicious spriggan once again, so that he might lead us to our prize!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>そもそも今回の「エッグハント」は、
ジリちゃんの見た不思議な夢をヒントに始めたもの！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_002<tab>In Jihli's dream, she first saw the spriggan in the dappled light of the Gridanian forests. Then the air became heavy with heat and incense, and she saw it scurry down the cobbled streets of Ul'dah─just as we witnessed it but a few moments ago.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_002<tab>夢のお告げによると、飾りタマゴを探すお祭りの最中、
迷い込んだ1匹の「幸運のスプリガン」に導かれて……
最後はみんなで、「大いなる宝物」を見つけるはずなの。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_003<tab>It is the final part of her vision that interests us now: how the sands grew brighter beneath the creature's toes, and the air around him rang with the voices of gulls and shantymen. It can only mean that the auspicious spriggan is to reappear in Limsa Lominsa!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_003<tab>「幸運のスプリガン」は、ウルダハを去ったあと、
今度はリムサ・ロミンサに現れるそうなのですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_004<tab>If so, he may be in mortal danger once more. Do you remember what my friend─ ...I mean─that awful, evil Shellshocker said? That he was to <var 1A 02 /var>see you later<var 1A 01 /var> in Limsa Lominsa! He must mean to follow the auspicious spriggan there, to follow through on his murderous plot!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_004<tab>ただ心配なのが、さっきここに来たノノッタのお友だち……
じゃなくて、悪の集団「エッグクラッシャー」！
あいつらも「幸運のスプリガン」を追ってるみたいなの。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_005<tab>So I beg you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>: head to Limsa Lominsa, and save the spriggan from the clutches of those abominable bandits. I must remain here to attend to the festivities in Ul'dah, but my dear friend Motte will be able to help you. May the Archons of yore bless you and keep you both!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_005<tab>そこで、ノノッタからお願いなのですぅ～！
リムサ・ロミンサで、「幸運のスプリガン」を守って！
詳しい話は、アフトカースルの「モット」ちゃんから聞いてね。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_010<tab>If the Shellshockers have their wicked way with the auspicious spriggan, all hope of the prophecy being fulfilled will be lost. Go to Limsa Lominsa, my friend, and speak with Motte by the Aftcastle. It is she who leads the revelries there, and will gladly grant you any aid you need.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_010<tab>ノノッタからお願いなのですぅ～！
リムサ・ロミンサで、「幸運のスプリガン」を守って！
詳しい話は、アフトカースルの「モット」ちゃんから聞いてね。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_020<tab>Welcome, adventurer. Might you be <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((gentleman)) /var> who saved the day in Ul'dah? Nono told me you would be coming, and I should be most grateful for your assistance.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_020<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ♪
あなたのことは、ウルダハのノノッタから聞いてるわ。
モットを手伝いにきてくれたのよねッ？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_021<tab>If it is news of the auspicious spriggan you are after, I have it in two varieties: good and bad. Let us begin with the good news: just as Jihli's vision predicted, a spriggan carrying an unusual egg had indeed been sighted in the city.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_021<tab>ちょうどね、ジリが夢で見た「幸運のスプリガン」が、
リムサ・ロミンサにも現れたところなの！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_022<tab>And now for the bad news: there is more than one. Several spriggans, each with an egg unlike our sorceresses' illusions, have been spotted around the town. There can be no doubt that all but one are fakes─men using magicks of their own device to disguise themselves as the auspicious spriggan.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_022<tab>……ところが、ちょっと困ったことになってるのよ。
「幸運のスプリガン」は、白黒のタマゴを持っているんだけど、
それと似たタマゴを持ったニセモノが、何匹か紛れ込んでるの！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_023<tab>It can only be those wicked Shellshockers from Ul'dah. They mean to distract our attentions from the true auspicious spriggan, and snatch it away from right under our noses!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_023<tab>きっと悪いやつらが潜り込んで、
みんなが「幸運のスプリガン」を探すのを、妨害してるんだわ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_024<tab>But when it comes to sneaky tricks, no man can match a sylph, and it just so happens that my sylphic helper has a cunning plan to expose these brigands. We only awaited a brave adventurer to put the plan into action, and now here you are! Speak with her, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and she will explain all.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_024<tab>だからお願い、「怪しいスプリガン」の正体を暴いてほしいの。
通りの向かいの「おまぢない師」さんに、
いい案があるらしいから、話を聞いてみて～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_030<tab>The sylphic sorceress over by the steps is an expert in the arts of illusion. She has come up with the perfect method of exposing those fiendish Shellshockers for the scoundrels they are. Heed well her plan, for it may be our only chance of finding the true auspicious spriggan.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_030<tab>「怪しいスプリガン」の正体を暴いてほしいの。
通りの向かいの「おまぢない師」さんに、
いい案があるらしいから、話を聞いてみて～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_050<tab>Happy hunting, walking one! This one has a clever plan to find out which furry one is the lucky one, and which are the shocking ones! Let this one tell walking one all about it.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_050<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ……で、ふっち♪
今から「怪しいスプリガン」の正体を見破る作戦を、
さずけてあげるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_051<tab>There are shocking ones in the city, using these ones' skin-changing tricks to look just like furry ones, and holding lucky eggs to look like the lucky one. So how can walking one tell which one is the real lucky one? With more of these ones' tricks, of course!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_051<tab>作戦は簡単でふっち！
珍しいタマゴを持ったスプリガンがいたら、声をかけて、
その隙に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」を投げつけるだけでふっち。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_052<tab>Take a look at these, walking one─magick<var 1F /var>breaking scalebombs that can see through the most powerful sylphic tricks. All walking one needs to do is find the lucky-looking ones, and toss a scalebomb at each one. Then walking one will see what walking one will see!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_052<tab>「怪しいスプリガン」は、ヒトが化けたニセモノみたいでふっち。
わたぴの鱗粉玉をぶつければ、おまぢないが解けるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_053<tab>Dreaming one says there are three suspicious ones that look like the lucky one around the upper decks. Dreaming one thinks one is the real lucky one, but they might all be shocking ones in disguise! Throw scalebombs at all three to find out which one is which!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_053<tab>珍しいタマゴを持ったスプリガンは、3匹いるらしいのでふっち。
もし「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」が効かないスプリガンがいたら、
そいつが本物の「幸運のスプリガン」なのでふっち！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_054<tab>But if shocking ones see walking one coming, shocking ones might get a shock, and run away! Better to change into a furry one again, to catch shocking ones unawares. This one will magick walking one into a furry one right away!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_054<tab>今は、みんながスプリガンの姿でお祭りに参加してるから、
キミもそうしたほうが、怪しまれないと思うのでふっち！
……というわけで、おまぢないをかけるでふっち！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Three spriggans carrying unusual eggs have been sighted on the upper decks of Limsa Lominsa. Disguise yourself as a spriggan, and throw a scalebomb at each of the suspicious spriggans to discover if the auspicious spriggan is among their number.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>珍しい「飾りタマゴ」を持ったスプリガンは、
リムサ・ロミンサの上甲板層に全部で3匹紛れ込んでいます。
そのうちの1匹が、本物の「幸運のスプリガン」です。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Should you succeed in uncovering the true auspicious spriggan, report back to Motte. If your transfiguration should fade before you have completed the task, speak to the sylphic sorceress again to be magicked back into spriggan form.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>本物を見つけたら、依頼者のモットに報告しましょう。
途中、誤って変身状態を解除してしまった場合には、
もう一度「おまぢない師」に話しかけ、再挑戦しましょう。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_070<tab>When walking one sees a lucky-looking one, get the lucky-looking one's attention, and throw a scalebomb before it can run away. If the lucky-looking still looks lucky after the bomb goes off, it must be the real lucky one!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_070<tab>珍しい「飾りタマゴ」を持ったスプリガンに声をかけて、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」を使うのでふっち！
鱗粉玉が効かない1匹が、「幸運のスプリガン」なのでふっち！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_075<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is that you? Did my sorceress friend give you the...<var 1A 02 /var>merchandise<var 1A 01 /var>? Excellent. Seek out the suspicious spriggans, and use the scalebombs on them. Oh, and do try to stay in disguise─if the Shellshockers see you reaching for another gift, they're sure to run for their lives!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_075<tab>その姿で、「怪しいスプリガン」の正体を見破ってきて～ッ！
そして、本物の「幸運のスプリガン」を見つけたら、
モットに報告をお願い。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_080<tab>Happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, walking one! Ah, but walking one should be disguised as a furry one, otherwise shocking ones will see walking one coming! This one will change walking one back straightaway.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_080<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ……で、ふっち♪
あれあれ、「変化のおまぢない」が解けたのでふっち？
もう一度、姿を変えてあげるのでふっち……そ～れ♪

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_085<tab>Do you have the scalebombs, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Good. Before you commence the operation, ask my sylphic assistant to transfigure you again. In spriggan form, those nasty Shellshockers won't know you from any other Hatching<var 1F /var>tide reveler─until you spring the trap!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_085<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ♪
変身が解けてしまったら、「おまぢない師」さんに頼んで、
おまぢないをかけてもらうといいわよ。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANA00559_000_100<tab>Eggy, eggy, eggyyy! I'm a lucky Spriggy! Lucky, lucky Spriggyyyyyy!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANA00559_000_100<tab>エギエギ、エーギ、エッギラリンーッ！
ラッギ、ラッギ、エーギ、エッギラリンーッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANA00559_000_101<tab>Eggy, eggy, eggyyy! I'm a lucky Spriggy! Lucky, lucky Spriggyyyyyy!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANA00559_000_101<tab>エギエギ、エーギ、エッギラリンーッ！
ナンガ、ヨウカ？　オレニ、ヨウカ？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_Q1_000_105<tab>Use a truesight scalebomb?
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_Q1_000_105<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」を使いますか？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_106<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_106<tab>はい

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_107<tab>No
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_107<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_110<tab>Aaagh! Oi, you! What d'you think you're─ ...Er, I mean...whatty, whatty, whattyyy─ ...Stone me, what's happened to my disguise!?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_110<tab>グハッ！　おめェ、何しやがんだ！
……って、ゲッ！　おまぢないが解けてんじゃねえか！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_111<tab>Grrr... Looks like the jig's up. You got me, bang to rights─I ain't the real auspicious spriggan, I'm a Shellshocker through and through. But while you're wasting your time on me, the lads are closing the net! Happy hunting, big ears!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_111<tab>ちっ、正体がバレちゃしょうがねえ！
そうとも、オレたちゃ「エッグクラッシャー」！
おめェらに「幸運のスプリガン」は渡さねえぞ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_125<tab>One of the spriggans <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> a Shellshocker after all? Then there's no doubt that another must be, too...if not both! Hurry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and track the two remaining suspicious spriggans down─we must find the real auspicious spriggan before they do!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_125<tab>そう、「怪しいスプリガン」はやっぱり、
人が化けたニセモノだったのね？
お願い、ほかの「怪しいスプリガン」の正体も、確かめてきて～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANB00559_000_130<tab>Eggy, eggy, eggyyy! Who's a lucky Spriggyyyyyy!?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANB00559_000_130<tab>エギエギ、エーギ、エッギラリンーッ！
オレタチャ、エッギ、ギラッシャリンーッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANB00559_000_131<tab>Eggy, eggy, eggyyy! Who's a lucky Spriggy? Are you a lucky Spriggyyyyyy!?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANB00559_000_131<tab>エギエギ、エーギ、エッギラリンーッ！
オレタチャ、エッギ、ギラッシャリンーッ！
オレオレ、ヨウカ？　オレ、ヨウカ？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_140<tab>Agh! What in the seven hells was that!?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_140<tab>おわっ……ゲホッ、ゲホッ、ゲホッ！
おい！　いきなり、なんてことするんだ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_141<tab>My disguise, it's gone! Sod this for a lark─they never told me I'd be taking a bomb to the face, let alone two... I ain't sticking around for a third!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_141<tab>って……ハッ！？
クッソ、正体がバレちまったようだな！
しかたねえ、ここは撤退するかッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_150<tab>You found a second suspicious spriggan, and he was a fake, too? Then the only one left must be the real auspicious spriggan! ...Provided it's not another bandit in disguise. You had better drop a scalebomb on him, too─it's the only way to be sure.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_150<tab>すごい、2匹のニセモノを見破ったのね？
だったら、残る1匹がきっと本物の「幸運のスプリガン」ね。
念のために「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A9D01 /var>」を使って、確かめてきて～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_150<tab>Spriggy find egg! Eeeeeegg! Spriggy find treasuuuuuure!!!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_150<tab>エギ、エギ、エギラ、エギラララァ～ッ♪
タマギ、サガサ！　タカラ、サガサ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_151<tab>Spriggy egg! Biggy egg! Big treasure! Treasuuuuuure!!!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_151<tab>エギ、エギ、エギラ、エギラララァ～ッ♪
オシエル、オシエル！　オッキナ、タカラ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_160<tab>Spriggy egg! Biggy egg! Big, big, biiig! Lucky treasure! Luckyyyyyy!!!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_160<tab>エギ、エギ、エギラ、エギラララァ～ッ♪
オッキナ、タマギ！　オッキナ、タカラ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_161<tab>Big, big eggies in the wild! The wiiiiiild! Lucky eggies! Lucky treasuuuuuure!!!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGAN00556_000_161<tab>サガサ、サガサ、マチノ、ソタ！
オッキナ、タマギ！　オッキナ、タカラ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_170<tab>Walking one found the real lucky one!? Hooray for walking one! Dreaming one will want to hear about this right away!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_170<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ……で、ふっち♪
……本物の「幸運のスプリガン」と会ったのでふっち？
だったら早く、モットに知らせてあげるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_200<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...if that <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> you under all that fluff. Allow me to dispel your disguise. Oh, don't worry─I'll just use a sprinkling of truesight scales. No cause for a bomb this time!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_200<tab>おつかれさま！
元の姿に戻してあげるね！
え～いッ♪

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_100_200<tab>So tell me: did you track down the third suspicious spriggan? ...You did? And it really was the auspicious spriggan from the prophecy─the same one you met in Ul'dah!? Thank goodness it was you who found him first, and not the hated Shellshockers, sworn enemies of Dreamers near and far!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_100_200<tab>ええっ！　「怪しいスプリガン」の正体は、
ウルダハから来た「エッグクラッシャー」だった……？
冒険者さん、邪魔者を撃退してくれてありがと～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_Q1_100_200<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_Q1_100_200<tab>なんと答える？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_101_200<tab>Enemies? They seemed rather friendly with Nonotta...
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_101_200<tab>あいつらとノノッタの関係は？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_102_200<tab>I aim to please.
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_102_200<tab>どういたしまして

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_103_200<tab>Wh-Wh-What!? Surely you can't suspect Nono of being in league with those villains? Why, the very idea is absurd! So absurd that it doesn't bear repeating...to anyone. Ever. But enough of this silliness─tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>: did the auspicious spriggan say anything to you?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_103_200<tab>えっ、ウルダハでノノッタとそいつらが親しげにしてた？
自作自演の疑い！？　それは……ひ、人違いじゃないかしらッ？
……そ、それより「幸運のスプリガン」とは無事に会えたの？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_104_200<tab>And please you have! Rest assured, when this day is done, you shall be the guest of honor at─ ...But we can talk about that later. We have more important matters to discuss at present: the auspicious spriggan first and foremost. Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, did he say anything to you?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_104_200<tab>冒険者さんって、ほんとに頼りになるわ！
で、「幸運のスプリガン」とは無事に会えたの？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_201<tab>“Big eggs, big treasure,” or words to that effect? The image they conjure seems somehow familiar... Of course! The enormous eggs from Jihli's vision!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_201<tab>そう……本物の「幸運のスプリガン」は、
「オッキナ、タマギ！　オッキナ、タカラ！」と言ったのね？
それって、ジリが夢で見た「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D3801 /var>」のことかも！？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_202<tab>Did she mention them to you? It wasn't just the cities of Eorzea that Jihli saw bustling with spriggans enjoying the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide revelries, but the fields and valleys, too. Out in the wilds, she saw the creatures dancing around immense, floating eggs.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_202<tab>ジリが見た夢ではね……街がお祭りでにぎわっているころ、
不思議なことに、街の外ではスプリガンたちが、
大きな「飾りタマゴ」のまわりをぐるぐる回っていたらしいの。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_203<tab>From her descriptions, we were able to divine the very locations she had seen in her dream, and what do you know? There they were! Giant, decorated eggs, buried beneath the topsoil! We had only to prise them free from the ground, and they took off into the air.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_203<tab>それでお祭りの前、夢で見たという場所にみんなで行ったらね……
本当に、大きな「飾りタマゴ」がいくつも見つかったの！
「大いなる宝物」はきっと、そこにあるんだわ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_204<tab>It was just as Jihli described it to us...excepting the lack of spriggans. So just as we have done in the cities, sylphic sorceresses have been posted to each location where the giant eggs were found. There they are conducting a special Hatching<var 1F /var>tide event that we call the enormous egg hunt!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_204<tab>そのタマゴ……「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D3801 /var>」が見つかった場所で、
モットの仲間たちは今、エッグハントの催しをやってるの。
ジリの夢を再現した「ジャイアントエッグハント」よッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_205<tab>Once our sylphic assistants transfigure adventurers into spriggan form to match Jihli's vision, they are free to cavort around the floating eggs─striking at them, and trying to crack them open. Whosoever lays an egg low is permitted to claim the prize inside.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_205<tab>そこではね、みんなでスプリガンの姿になって、
宙に浮かぶ巨大なタマゴをやっつけるの！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_206<tab>Could the wondrous treasure from the prophecy be contained in one of these eggs? What in the world could it be...? If I gave you a list of all the places we found the eggs, would you go there, join in the enormous egg hunt, and bring whatever you find inside back to me?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_206<tab>いったい、どんな宝物が見つかるのかな……。
場所は紙に書いて渡すから、現地で催しに参加してきてくれる？
証拠の品として「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」を持って帰って～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_207<tab>Bring the scenes from Jihli Aliapoh's prophetic dream to life by participating in the FATE “Gloria in Eggcelsis.” Crack open the giant, floating eggs to obtain the lucky eggs within.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_207<tab>ジリ・アリアポーの不思議な夢を再現した、
F.A.T.E.『ジャイアントエッグハント』に参加し、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」を入手しましょう。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_208<tab>The locations where the FATE will appear are noted in your journal. Complete the FATE in any of the listed locations to proceed in the quest.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_208<tab>F.A.T.E.が発生する場所は、メインコマンドの
「ジャーナル」から確認できます。
どの場所のF.A.T.E.を達成しても、本クエストを進行できます。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_209<tab>In order to participate in the FATE, you will need to be transfigured into spriggan form. Speak with the sylphic sorceress at the FATE location to be transfigured.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_209<tab>F.A.T.E.『ジャイアントエッグハント』に参加するには、
まず、現地の「おまぢない師」に話しかけ、
スプリガンの姿に変身します。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>When the enormous egg appears, attack it using the skill “Quickchant,” which can be activated from the pet hotbar. Continue to attack the egg until it cracks, and you will be rewarded with lucky eggs. There is no limit to the number of lucky eggs you can collect.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>宙に浮かぶ巨大な飾りタマゴ「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D3801 /var>」が現れたら、
「変身状態」のままでターゲットし、
EXホットバーから「クイックチャント」を実行します。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>To open a lucky egg and collect the prize inside, simply <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>use<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> it from your inventory.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_211<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D3801 /var>が動作を停止するまで攻撃を続けると、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」を入手できます。
このアイテムは、何度でも入手可能です。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_213<tab>Alternatively, lucky eggs can be exchanged for special items by speaking with the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide Dreamers in any of the three city<var 1F /var>states.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_213<tab><var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>を「使う」と、中身の贈り物が手に入ります。
何が入っているかは、開けてからのお楽しみです！
このアイテムは、ショップで他の品に交換することもできます。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_230<tab>Out in the wilds, adventuring ones are dressing as furry ones, and cracking open giant floating ones! Will walking one be joining in too?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_230<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ……で、ふっち♪
街の外に現れた、おっきな「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D3801 /var>」を、
みんなで止めるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPHFIELD_000_240<tab>Greetings, walking one, and welcome to the enormous egg hunt! This one will turn walking one into a furry one, then walking one can join in too. Crack open the giant egg to win what's inside! Just be careful it doesn't crack walking one open first!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPHFIELD_000_240<tab>エグ、エグ、エグル、エッグルルルゥ～……で、ふっち♪
キミを「スプリガン」の姿に変えてあげるから、
その姿で「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D3801 /var>」を叩き割るのでふっち……えいっ♪

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPHFIELD_000_245<tab>Now walking one is ready to join the hunt! If walking one cracks open the enormous egg, walking one will win a wonderful prize. If the magick fades, come back to this one, and this one will magick walking one into a furry one again.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPHFIELD_000_245<tab>その姿で「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D3801 /var>」を叩き割るのでふっち！
そしたら、素敵な贈り物が手に入るのでふっち♪
変身が解けたら、わたぴに話しかけるといいでふっち。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_250<tab>Greetings once again, my friend. How went the egg hunt? My sylphic sorceresses tell me that the floating giants are yielding lucky eggs to their victors. Were you rewarded with the same?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_250<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ♪
「ジャイアントエッグハント」には参加してくれた？
証拠の品として、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」を渡してほしいの！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_260<tab>You were! Is the great treasure that shall bring great joy to all the realm contained within this unassuming orb? My fingers itch to open it, but I promised Jihli that I would wait until─ ...Ah, but here she comes now.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_260<tab>「ジャイアントエッグハント」に参加してくれたのね！
実はね、「大いなる宝物」が見つかりそうだって、
グリダニアのジリにも知らせておいたの……あ、来たきた！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_261<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I came as soon as I received word! Does Motte speak true? Have you found the wondrous treasure the prophecy spoke of?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_261<tab>やったね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
私、急いで駆けつけたんだよ。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_262<tab>Indeed <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has, and it dwells within this very egg I hold in my hands. The auspicious spriggan guided <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to the enormous eggs from your vision, and this was the prize <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> found inside. It can only be the prophesied treasure!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_262<tab>冒険者さんが「ジャイアントエッグハント」に参加して、
この「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」を持ってきてくれたの。
もしかして、ジリが夢で見た「大いなる宝物」が入ってたりして！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_263<tab>A lucky egg that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> won from the enormous egg hunt? But didn't we prepare all those prizes ourselves? The treasure from my vision was supposed to be a gift from the Archons of─ ...Hmmm?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_263<tab>……さすがに、それはどうかな？
だって、その「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」は、
お祭り用に私たちが用意したものだし……って、ン？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANA00559_000_264<tab>Spriggy done job, now Spriggy want pay! Paaaaaay! Give me eggiiies! Eggiiiiiies!!!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SPRIGGANA00559_000_264<tab>エギ、エギ、エギラ、エギラララァ～ッ♪
シゴト、オワタ！　クレクレ、ホウシュウ！　クレクレ、タマギ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_265<tab>Not now, Spriggy! I'll give you all the eggs you want, but only when the festival is over, and not a moment earlier. Until then, you're the <var 1A 02 /var>auspicious spriggan<var 1A 01 /var>, and don't you forget it!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_265<tab>……ちょ、ちょっと！　まだここに来ちゃだめよ！
お祭りが終わるまで、「幸運のスプリガン」のフリをしてて、
って約束したでしょ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_100_265<tab>Quickly now, there's a good boy! And don't let me catch you in the city until─ ...Ah.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_100_265<tab>そうそう、あっちに行ってて！
聞きわけのいい子ね……って、ハッ！？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_266<tab>Motte! What is the meaning of this!? That was the auspicious spriggan that I saw in my dream, I am sure of it─but how do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> know him? And what is this talk of pretense and payment? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, please, tell me: what in the world is going on!?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_266<tab>えっ、えっ？　どういうこと！？
報酬が欲しい、って言ってたようだけど……
あの子って「幸運のスプリガン」なんじゃないの！？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_Q1_000_270<tab>What will you say?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_Q1_000_270<tab>「幸運のスプリガン」が、どういうわけか、
モットに報酬を要求していたようだが……？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_271<tab>They've faked the whole thing.
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_271<tab>みんなグルだった？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_272<tab>I don't know. Maybe Motte can explain...
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_A1_000_272<tab>モットに説明してもらおう

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_280<tab>What!? You mean it's not only Motte and the auspicious spriggan, but Nonotta, and the Shellshockers too...? Why, Motte? Why would you try to fool me like this?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_280<tab>ええっ？　ここだけじゃなくて、ウルダハでも、
ノノッタと悪者が親しそうにしていた、ですって！？
……それってどういうことなの、モットちゃん？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_290<tab>I'm sorry, Jihli... I can't keep the truth from you any longer.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_290<tab>もう、ごまかしきれないわよね。
白状するわ……。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_300<tab>Jihli, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... The truth is, we've been deceiving you both. Everything that has happened─the auspicious spriggan appearing, being chased by the Shellshockers, guiding you to the giant eggs─none of it was real. We staged it all.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_300<tab>ごめんなさい、冒険者さん……。
……ごめんなさい、ジリ。
あの、実はね……何もかも、モットたちのお芝居なの。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_301<tab>The auspicious spriggan is actually my friend. Spriggy is his name. I made an egg for him, just like the one you described in your vision, and asked him to pose as the auspicious spriggan in exchange for a hundred Hatching<var 1F /var>tide eggs...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_301<tab>さっきの子はね、モットのお友だちのスプリガン。
お祭りの間だけ、っていう約束で「幸運のスプリガン」役を、
演じてもらっていたの……ううん、それだけじゃないわ。

source:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_302<tab>As for the Shellshockers─they're Nonotta's friends from the Weavers' Guild. When they're not acting as bandits, they make the most adorable quilts. And the enormous eggs─we <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> find them buried in the ground in the places you dreamed of, I swear, but they were ugly, metallic things.
We decorated them to match the Archon eggs from your vision, and filled them with lucky eggs to act as the prophesied treasure...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_302<tab>悪者の「エッグクラッシャー」は、モットたちの協力者。
冒険者さんが動きを止めた、大きな「飾りタマゴ」も、
土の中に埋まってた謎の物体を、飾りつけたものなの……。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_303<tab>So it was all a lie? You, Nonotta, and the other Dreamers...you staged everything to make it match my vision? Why would you do this!?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_303<tab>全部、私の夢が現実になるように、仕組んだってこと！？
どうして！　どうして、そんなことをしたの？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_304<tab>Because we were worried about you! Every time we saw you, you were so very anxious─frightened that this year, your dream wouldn't come true. So we pledged to do whatever it took to make sure that it would!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_304<tab>だって、だって……心配だったの！
夢のお告げが外れそうで、ジリが落ち込んでるっていうから！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_305<tab>But it hasn't! My visions are blessings from the Archons of yore, not mere pantomimes to be acted out by a band of second-rate mummers! I wished for us to set the stage for the prophecy to be fulfilled, not act it out ourselves! Now the whole thing is ruin─ ...Hm?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_305<tab>私たちは、夢で見た舞台を準備するだけ！
自分たちでお芝居までして、無理やりお告げを実現するなんて、
そんなの…………って、あれっ？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_306<tab>Wh-What is this...this feeling? It is as if I have witnessed this scene before... Yes, yes! It was in my dream! I saw myself...and you, Motte. I saw us quarreling...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_306<tab>何これ……既視感……？
私、あの不思議な夢で……こうしてモットちゃんと言い争ってた。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_307<tab>I...I saw it through your eyes, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! All of it─the auspicious spriggan in Gridania, the Shellshockers in Ul'dah, the scalebombs in Limsa Lominsa, <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> the enormous egg hunt!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_307<tab>それに……ねえ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
お祭りも、大きなタマゴも、幸運のスプリガンも……
私が夢で見た光景は、あなたの前で実現してる……ような？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_308<tab>Jihli, do you know what this means? Your dream was indeed a vision of the future─it is not so much that we staged the events of your vision, but that you envisioned the events that we were to stage! Your vision has come true, and so shall the prophecy!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_308<tab>もしかして……わかったわ、ジリ！
あなたが見た夢は、やっぱり「本物の未来」だったのよ！
正確には、モットたちの「お芝居」を見ちゃったことになるけど。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_309<tab>Perhaps... But still, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was unaware of your secret plans─you have been quite beastly to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, treating <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as an unwitting pawn in your games. My vision ended here, so tell me, Motte: what was to be the denouement of your little drama?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_309<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>にも迷惑かけたし、
まだ、いまひとつ納得いかないけど……
あなたたちの筋書きでは、その後、どうする予定だったの？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_310<tab>Well, if you promise not to be angry... My sylphic friend taught me another of her tricks─no magicks, or explosives, just a little sleight of hand. I do not know what <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s lucky egg contains, but it is no great treasure─I was planning to substitute its contents with this map.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_310<tab>えっと、怒らないでね……冒険者さんの持ってきた、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2276701 /var>」の中身を、
この「宝の地図」とすりかえるつもりだったの。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_311<tab>...With a cross over the Bismarck. So if I go there, I'll discover what “wondrous treasure” you've laid in store for me?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_311<tab>レストラン「ビスマルク」に印がついてる……
そこに行けば、あなたたちのたくらみがわかるってこと？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_312<tab>Yes. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you must come too─a share in the treasure is the least I can offer for all we've put you through. Speak with the fellow with the eyepatch by the restaurant entrance. I'm sure you'll find you have much to discuss...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_312<tab>冒険者さん、あなたもビスマルクに来て。
入口の「ワルぶった眼帯男」に声をかけてちょうだい。
……そこで、何もかもお話しするわ。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_330<tab>I do hope you can find it in your heart to forgive us, and meet with us at the Bismarck. If you do decide to come, a...<var 1A 02 /var>friend<var 1A 01 /var> will be waiting for you by the entrance.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_330<tab>冒険者さん、あなたもビスマルクに来て。
入口の「ワルぶった眼帯男」に声をかけてちょうだい。
……そこで、何もかもお話しするわ。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_335<tab>This one, and the lucky one, and the shocking ones, and the dreaming ones... These ones were all in it together! This one is sorry this one didn't tell walking one anything, but these ones wanted to keep it a secret...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_FRIENDLYSYLPH00559_000_335<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ……で、ふっち♪
わたぴも、スプリガンも、みんなグルだったのでふっち……。
ごめんなさいでふっち……。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_350<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank you for coming. And welcome to the party!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_350<tab>エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ♪
ようこそ、パーティー会場へ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_351<tab>Happy nameday, Jihli!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_351<tab>ジリちゃん！
ハッピー・バースデーなのですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_352<tab>(-All-)HAPPY NAMEDAY!
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_352<tab>(-パーティー参加者たち-)おめでとう～！！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_353<tab>Good to finally have you with us, Miss Aliapoh! ...Miss Aliapoh? Ha ha! Looks like we've really knocked her off her feet!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_353<tab>なーに、呆然としてんだ？
ジリちゃんのために用意した、サプライズパーティーだぞ？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_354<tab>Well, it wouldn't be a surprise party if it wasn't a surprise! We saw that you were worried about the festival, and your nameday was coming up, so we thought we'd kill two birds with one stone! We all worked together to make it happen!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_354<tab>そうそう！
誕生日も近いのに、ジリちゃんが沈んでるって聞いて……
ノノッタたち、一生懸命お芝居を打ったんですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_355<tab>And I got the short end of the stick! D'you remember me, adventurer? Aye, I'm the Shellshocker who took a couple of your scalebombs to the mug! No harm done, though. Jihli's always so kind, laying in all these gifts for the smallfolk. It was well worth it to give a little something back.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_355<tab>冒険者さん！　オレだよ、「エッグクラッシャー」だ！
いつも元気をもらってるジリちゃんに、
ビッグなサプライズでお返しをしたくてな……迷惑かけちまった！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_356<tab>We're sorry for keeping you in the dark, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We were so fixated on making the plan work─recreating the scenes from Jihli's vision, and leading her to a surprise party at the end of it, we didn't think of the strain we'd be putting on the adventurer who found the spriggan...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_MOTTE_000_356<tab>夢のとおりに事を進めて、最後はお誕生祝いに招こうと思ってたら、
街の協力者さんたちが、ノリノリで突っ走っちゃって……。
冒険者さん、巻き込んでしまって、ごめんなさいッ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_357<tab>Y-You mean...you did all this for me? I'm honored, truly I am...but─
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_357<tab>ええっ？　みんな、私のために……？
でも……でも！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_358<tab>But this isn't how it should be! Hatching<var 1F /var>tide should be about joining hands with adventurers to bring the will of the Archons to life, not tricking them into following our own secret schemes! It should be about bringing joy to all, not just to me...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_358<tab>だめだよ！　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>にも迷惑かけたし、
それにエッグハントは、街のみんなのためのお祭りだよ！
私だけが楽しんじゃ……！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_359<tab>Aye, and that's what we've brung! You've done so much to raise the spirits of the smallfolk since the Calamity, it lifts all our hearts to do something for you in return. And anyway, this party ain't just for you and us, Miss Aliapoh─everyone's welcome to join the revelry as they please!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_359<tab>いつも世話ンなってるジリちゃんを励まそうって言い出したのは、
そもそも、オレたち三都市の都市民なんだ。
パーティーは、街の連中も出入り自由だぜ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_360<tab>And when the party's over, we'll return to our posts, and get back to running the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities─the <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> festivities─with all our hearts! We'll fulfill this prophecy if it's the last thing we do!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_NONOTTA_000_360<tab>それに、パーティーが終わったらまた、
実行委員長としてバリバリ働いてもらう予定なのですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_361<tab>Thank you, Nonotta─everyone... But perhaps the prophecy is already fulfilled. In my vision, I saw the arrival of the auspicious spriggan, and the drama that you laid in store to lead me here, but there was more: the Archons of yore also delivered a message unto me.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_361<tab>そうだったの……ありがとう。
あのね……エッグハントの前に見た、不思議な夢のなかでね。
私、こんな声を聞いたの。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_362<tab>“Arise, young Dreamer,” they said, “follow in the footsteps of the bearer of fortune, who will tour the wonders of this blessed land. Only by this may you surmount a grave peril, and find a wondrous treasure.”
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_362<tab>「幸運の担い手、大いなる揺籃をめぐり、
　大いなる危難の先に、大いなる宝物を見出す」……

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_363<tab>At first, I thought that the bearer of fortune must be the auspicious spriggan, and the peril the Shellshockers, but if all was an act, that can scarce be so...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_363<tab>「幸運のスプリガン」に導かれて、大きな宝物を見つける……
最初は、そういう意味だと思ってたんだ。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_364<tab>Instead, I have come to quarrel with my dearest friends─a grave peril that could have spelled the end of the festival. But by the warmth of your hearts, we have overcome these troubles, and together we vow once more to make Hatching<var 1F /var>tide as joyous as it can be.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_364<tab>だけど、本当は……友だちと言い争いなんかもしたけど、
それを乗り越えて、みんなとの絆を確かめあえたこと。
これからも、エッグハントのお祭りを続ける決意ができたこと……

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_365<tab>It is this that is the wondrous treasure! The scenes that I saw in my vision may have been mere mummery, but nonetheless, the prophecy has been fulfilled! We have overcome a grave peril, and found a wondrous treasure, all guided by the bearer of fortune: not the auspicious spriggan...
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_365<tab>……それが、「大いなる宝物」なんだね！
そして、この場所へ導いてくれた「幸運の担い手」というのは、
「幸運のスプリガン」じゃなくて、きっと……

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_366<tab>...But you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It is through your eyes that I witnessed the scenes from my vision, and by your hands that the drama reached its finale. Thanks to you, the will of the Archons has been brought to fruition once more!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_366<tab>……あなたのことだと思うの。
ありがとう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_370<tab>(-???-)'Ere, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─where d'ye think <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> off to?
target: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_370<tab>(-？？？？-)……おっと、まだ終わってねえぞ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_371<tab>I been after ye all evenin', <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Don't worry yerself, now─I ain't lookin' fer the last dance. I've got a little somethin' fer ye, on behalf o' the guild.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_371<tab>お前さん、探したぜ！
いやなに、冒険者ギルドからの、
ちょっとした預かりものを届けにきたんだ。

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_372<tab>A little bird tells me ye 'elped save the realm from a worse lickin' than a kiss with a fishback. 'Tis only right ye get yer reward fer findin' them Allagan killin' machines, and doin' away with 'em afore they did away with us!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_372<tab>聞けばお前さんたち、古代文明が遺した恐ろしい兵器の、
息の根を止めたっていうじゃねぇか？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_373<tab>Don't be so modest, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! You an' yer mates might've hushed it up, but the guild's got ways an' means o' findin' these things out. We both know what them “enormous eggs” really were.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_373<tab>そう謙遜しなさんなって！
ほら、でっかいタマゴ型の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F205C001 /var>」とかいうやつだよ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_374<tab>If them 'oary ol' contraptions'd been left to linger, they would've blown all Eorzea to kingdom come! Small wonder ye kept it to yerselves─if the smallfolk caught wind of the 'orrors lurkin' 'neath their feet, we would've 'ad a panic on our 'ands.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_374<tab>あれな……ここだけの話、あのまま放っときゃ、
エオルゼアの主要都市を次々に壊滅させかねなかった、
トンデモない兵器らしいぜ？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_375<tab>That was yer thinkin', weren't it? Dress it all up as part of the Hatchin'<var 1F /var>tide revelries, an' take the buggers out quick an' quiet afore rumor can spread. Ye've got a wise 'ead on them shoulders, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, an' the guild's seen fit to grant ye a fittin' meed.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_375<tab>その恐るべき脅威を、人心に不安を与えないように、
エッグハントの祭りを装いつつ、迅速に滅殺した功績を称え……
とかいう賞状と一緒に、さる筋から報奨金を預かったんだ！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_376<tab>What? Ye were only goin' along with that lass's dream? Followin' a bearer o' fortune to find a great treasure? An' ye reckoned that bit in the middle about “tourin' the wonders” was talkin' about travelin' 'round Eorzea?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_376<tab>へ？　女の子が見た、夢のお告げのとおりにしただけ？
「幸運の担い手、大いなる揺籃をめぐり、
　大いなる危難の先に、大いなる宝物を見出す」だって？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_377<tab>No, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, no─it were those enormous eggs it were goin' on about! Ye saved us from the peril o' those Allagan abominations, an' as fer the wondrous treasure─well, what more can a feller ask fer than to wake up in the mornin' an' find he ain't been blown up in 'is bed?
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_377<tab>そりゃ、お前さんたちがタマゴの周りをぐるぐる回って、
エオルゼアの危機を救ったことを言ってるんじゃないのか？
平和こそ、何にもかえがたい宝、って言うしな！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_378<tab>An' the way ye tell it, ye never even 'ad the faintest glimmer ye were savin' the realm from a right royal keelhaulin'... If that ain't the work of a <var 1A 02 /var>bearer o' fortune<var 1A 01 /var>, I don't know what is.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_378<tab>しかし、お前さんの話だと、
みんなで、何も知らずに世界を救っちまったことになるな。
まさに「幸運の担い手」……ってトコか？

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_379<tab>So it seems to me, at least, but what does a rum-soaked ol' bandit know 'bout visions an' prophecies? Let's you an' me keep this between ourselves, eh? When it comes to learnin' the realm's been saved by luck and luck alone...ignorance is bliss!
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_BADERON_000_379<tab>……ま、よくわからんが、
この話は、俺とお前さんだけの秘密にしとくか。
「知らぬは幸いなり」ってな！

source: TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must be under the transfigured status.
target:
TEXT_FESEST103_00559_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>このクエストを進行させるには、
「変身状態」である必要があります。
